messages.subject: penpals
messages.msgSnippet: For those who emailed me privately about being penpals with my 11 year old daughter, I have lost all the info.  I was having pc problems and in the process of
messages.messageBody:
For those who emailed me privately about being penpals with my 11 year old daughter, I have lost all the info. I was having pc problems and in the process of fixing it, my email program was wiped clean, including all the stuff I had saved.

To save you any trouble though, my daughter is not sure she wants to write via snail mail. She prefers email.

If your children still want to be penpals via email, let me know offlist.

My apologies for the inconvenience.

Kristen (litlrooh@...)


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
